author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Cathay Pacific Event Offers a Unique Behind-The-Scenes Experience at Hong Kong International AirportTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Cathay Pacific Event Offers a Unique Behind-The-Scenes Experience at Hong Kong International Airport Published  
Cathay Pacific cordially invites members of the press to attend a special event being organised by the airline on Sunday, 1 November 2015.
Aviation is vital to Hong Kong’s economic development and for connecting the city to the world. As the city’s home carrier for the past seven decades, Cathay Pacific is delighted to invite members of the Hong Kong public to enjoy a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity – a behind-the-scenes experience where they can see what goes into helping passengers travel well.
Participants will be able to explore one of the airline’s state-of-the-art Boeing 777-300ER aircraft, inside and out, meet members of our operations teams, including pilots, cabin crew and engineers, and enjoy many memorable opportunities with family and friends. Cathay Pacific will also be unveiling an exciting new development that marks yet another chapter in the airline’s rich history.
 
 
Source:- Cathay Pacific Airways
